text: Tumi balo -- ''allah‌ke bada diye yadera tomara daka tadera katha ki tomara bhebe dekhecha? Prthibira kona jinisa tara srsti kareche amake dekha'o to? Athaba tadera ki kono ansa ache mahakasamandalite? Amara kache era agera kono grantha athaba jnanera kono pramanya ciha niye esa, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
